data.actual_result: The app consistently crashes and will repeatedly crash, as the text channel is loaded again when the app restarts
data.expected_result: The preview loads and the app continues running normally
data.short_description: Certain image causes crash when preview is loaded
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any channel where you have embed permission (or just a DM) - Make sure that you have a computer so you can delete the image, or have someone else send and delete, so that you aren't caught in a crash loop. - Send this image in the channel and let the preview load: <https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/347974380862570499/352558217274064897/gmagik.gif>
